overview: J. Dean Paolucci brings over thirty years of enterprise sales and sales management leadership to iEnvision. A proven track record of delivering successful results along with domain expertise in the Financial Services, Life Sciences, and Legal verticals are a perfect fit to lead our sales effort. His demonstrated commitment to customer satisfaction makes him uniquely qualified to leverage his experience and relationships with partners such as Autonomy. Dean joined the iEnvision Management Team in 2009. Prior to joining iEnvision, Dean has held significant positions with leading technology companies such as Interwoven, Electronic Data Systems, Platinum Technologies, and Dun & Bradstreet. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Management from Ithaca College.
